CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 1, 2008

[Cite as 04/01/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-0hio-1510.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-1304. Marlington Local School Dist. v. Doe.

Stark App. No. 2006CA00102, 2007-0hio~2815. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal *1451from the Court of Appeals for Stark County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion to seal the supplement,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
